TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IWindowsFormsEditorService

summary.span: 在設計模式中提供 的介面，以顯示 Windows Form 或從屬性方格控制項的下拉區域中顯示控制項。

span.span: Provides an interface for a to display Windows Forms or to display a control in a drop-down area from a property grid control in design mode.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 才可透過方法控制項。The is only available through the method of the control. 此服務通常用來顯示中的表單方法。This service is typically used to display a form from the method of a . 當叫用方法編輯屬性的值提供使用者介面的參考傳遞給方法，通常可以提供的執行個體.When a invokes the method of a to provide a user interface for editing the value of a property, the method is passed a reference to an that can typically provide an instance of the . 可以使用此服務的方法，以顯示對話方塊和表單，或顯示下拉式清單會顯示在屬性方格附近正在編輯其值的值欄位區域頂端的容器內。The methods of this service can be used to display dialog boxes and forms, or to show a within a drop down container that is shown on top of the property grid near the area of the value field whose value is being edited. ## Examples 下列範例提供一個範例使用顯示使用者輸入。The following example provides an example that uses an to display a for user input. [!code-cpp[WinFormsEditorServiceDialogExample#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/WinFormsEditorServiceDialogExample/CPP/winformsedserviceeditordialogexample.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[WinFormsEditorServiceDialogExample#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/WinFormsEditorServiceDialogExample/CS/winformsedserviceeditordialogexample.cs#1)] [!code-vb[WinFormsEditorServiceDialogExample#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/WinFormsEditorServiceDialogExample/VB/winformsedserviceeditordialogexample.vb#1)] 下列範例提供一個範例使用顯示下拉式清單使用者輸入。The following example provides an example that uses an to display a drop-down for user input. [!code-cpp[WinFormsEditorServiceDropDownExample#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/WinFormsEditorServiceDropDownExample/CPP/winformsedserviceeditordropdownexample.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[WinFormsEditorServiceDropDownExample#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/WinFormsEditorServiceDropDownExample/CS/winformsedserviceeditordropdownexample.cs#1)] [!code-vb[WinFormsEditorServiceDropDownExample#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/WinFormsEditorServiceDropDownExample/VB/winformsedserviceeditordropdownexample.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void CloseDropDown() cil managed

summary.span: 關閉先前開啟的任何下拉控制項區域。

span.span: Closes any previously opened drop down control area.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會關閉的控制項，使用已顯示的容器區域下拉式方法，並釋放的下拉式清單控制項容器的參考。This method closes the drop down container area for a control that has been shown using the method, and releases the drop down container's reference to the control.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void DropDownControl(class System.Windows.Forms.Control control) cil managed

span.span: The drop down list to open.

summary.span: 在提供這個服務之屬性方格值欄位下方的下拉區域中，顯示指定的控制項。

span.span: Displays the specified control in a drop down area below a value field of the property grid that provides this service.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法可以呼叫這個方法，以裝載編輯器 使用這項服務的屬性方格上方，顯示下拉式區域中的指定的控制項。The method of a can call this method to display a specified control in a drop down area over the property grid hosting the editor which uses this service. 如果可能的話，仍會維護控制項的維度。When possible, the dimensions of the control will be maintained. 如果這是不可能會因為螢幕的配置，控制項可能會調整大小。If this is not possible due to the screen layout, the control may be resized. 若要確保控制項會調整大小整齊，您應該實作停駐和錨定，並可能是任何調整大小事件處理常式更新的程式碼。To ensure that the control resizes neatly, you should implement docking and anchoring, and possibly any resize event-handler update code. 如果使用者執行動作 [關閉]，控制項下拉式清單會隱藏並處置透過記憶體回收，如果沒有其他的原因，儲存控制項的參考。If the user performs an action that causes the drop down to close, the control will be hidden and disposed by garbage collection if there is no other stored reference to the control.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance valuetype System.Windows.Forms.DialogResult ShowDialog(class System.Windows.Forms.Form dialog) cil managed
Public Function ShowDialog (dialog As Form) As DialogResult

span.span: A indicating the result code returned by the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會顯示指定的表單。This method displays the specified form.
